_header: If God send thee plenteously riches
Subjects: carols, of moral counsel; advice, moral
_description: ‘Nolite cor apponere’ — three quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Diuisie si affluant / Nolite cor apponere’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Yf god send þe plentuowsly richesthan thank hartely with all
                    meknes…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…from all thy riches þou mayst not say natþerfore
                    þe best þat I can syng or sayNolite cor
                    apponereExplicit
